title: How to Make a Car Racing Game in Scratch

steps.headline: First go into scratch, and you will see the scratch cat on the main white blank small square left click on it.
steps.description: It then should say 'delete' as one of the options click it to delete the cat.

steps.headline: When you have deleted the cat, you can then start to make your game.
steps.description: To start look along the top of the screen and you will see three buttons, one of them is called 'Costumes' click on it. Then click on the button 'Paint' under the Costumes button next to the description 'New costume:’

steps.headline: When you clicked on it, another smallest window/box should come up called 'Paint Editor' with all the right tools for you to go and design your own racing car sprite.To make sure that it will not touch the sides of the racing track, draw a small circle in front of the car with a colour that you haven't or will not use any of the time when designing.
When you have finished designing your car sprite, click 'OK' at the bottom of the screen.
Design your stage, which will be your racing track.
steps.description: To do so, click on the blank square called 'Stage' underneath the main white space which should have your car sprite on it now. Go where it said 'New costume' it now should say 'New background' and press paint next to it.

steps.headline: The same 'Paint Editor' window should be there, but for you not to design your car sprite anymore but for you to design the racing track.
steps.description: When you have finished designing click 'OK' at the bottom of the screen/window.

steps.headline: You can now start to make your rules for the game so that the car moves.
steps.description: by going into the things called "Motion" which is in blue in the left top hand corner of the page/window and click and drag things in the center blank gray space on the window and click other things to connect to them.

text: First go into scratch, and you will see the scratch cat on the main white blank small square left click on it. It then should say 'delete' as one of the options click it to delete the cat. When you have deleted the cat, you can then start to make your game. To start look along the top of the screen and you will see three buttons, one of them is called 'Costumes' click on it. Then click on the button 'Paint' under the Costumes button next to the description 'New costume:’ When you clicked on it, another smallest window/box should come up called 'Paint Editor' with all the right tools for you to go and design your own racing car sprite.To make sure that it will not touch the sides of the racing track, draw a small circle in front of the car with a colour that you haven't or will not use any of the time when designing.  When you have finished designing your car sprite, click 'OK' at the bottom of the screen.  Design your stage, which will be your racing track. To do so, click on the blank square called 'Stage' underneath the main white space which should have your car sprite on it now. Go where it said 'New costume' it now should say 'New background' and press paint next to it. The same 'Paint Editor' window should be there, but for you not to design your car sprite anymore but for you to design the racing track. When you have finished designing click 'OK' at the bottom of the screen/window. You can now start to make your rules for the game so that the car moves. by going into the things called "Motion" which is in blue in the left top hand corner of the page/window and click and drag things in the center blank gray space on the window and click other things to connect to them.
